name: Victims Of War
description:
Game objective:

- You must reach a distance of 200km.

- Your troops must not drop to 0.

- Have at least 70% and above influence.

A game inspired by the Vietnam war, not the most accurate representation but I designed it to be "fun". It is a board game where you need to survive the dense jungle while under constant ambush by the communist.  It will be updated soon (probably a long time), but progress won't be that fast and of quality.

Upcoming Update:

- Fix UI and resolution.

- Fix bugs and add more game mechanics.

"I swear that tree just whispered, I am not crazy or drunk."  - Some Vietnam war soldier
